intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce costs and maximize value from their insurance plans.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their insurance costs are too high or are exploring ways to optimize their expenses.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to provide cost-saving calculators and personalized insurance recommendations.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded tools (e.g., calculators).

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the right insurance plan
intents.user_motivation: Users want guidance on selecting plans that align with their needs and budgets.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are overwhelmed by options or unsure about coverage details.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in simplifying complex financial decisions through digital tools and European market insights.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Comparison guides with visual aids (e.g., charts, tables).

intents.sub_intent: mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid costly errors during claims processes.
intents.search_context: Users search this when preparing to file a claim or after experiencing issues with adjusters.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide expert-backed advice and trust-building content to position ING as a reliable financial partner.

intents.sub_intent: how to maximize insurance claim payouts
intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they receive the full value of their claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing damage or loss and are preparing to file claims.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Offer digital claim tracking tools and expert tips to streamline the process.

intents.sub_intent: how to avoid paying high auto insurance rates
intents.user_motivation: Users want to reduce their auto insurance costs without compromising coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when renewing policies or comparing rates.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital banking leadership to offer bundled insurance discounts and rate comparison tools.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to avoid paying high auto insurance rates
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can provide personalized cost-saving tools and bundled discounts through its digital banking platform.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop a unified resource hub with calculators, comparison tools, and actionable guides.

sub_intents: mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance adjusters
how to maximize insurance claim payouts
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Position ING as a trusted advisor by offering expert-backed claims advice and digital tracking tools.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create detailed guides and templates to simplify claims processes for users.

sub_intents: how to choose the right insurance plan
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's European expertise to provide localized insights and plan comparisons.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop comparison guides and visual aids to help users make informed decisions.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to avoid paying high auto insurance rates
how to maximize insurance claim payouts
quick_wins: Create listicles with actionable tips for saving on premiums.
Develop interactive tools for comparing auto insurance rates.
strategic_priorities: Invest in a comprehensive resource hub for insurance cost optimization.
Build trust-focused content around claims management processes.
